documentation.text:
@dev Contract Variables:
 {lpPair} - The pair and the pool.
 {poolId} - Bytes32 representation of the {lpPair}.
 
 The implementation of “Scalable Reward Distribution on the Ethereum Blockchain” paper by B. Batog, L. Boca and N. Johnson.
 {totalDeposits} - The sum of all active stake deposits | (T).
 {sumOfRewards} - The sum of (rewards)/(totalDeposits) | (S).
 {stakes} - All stakes made by users | (stake).
 {sumOfRewardsForUser} - A sumOfRewards for users at pool join time | (S0).

typeDescriptions.typeString: function () view returns (contract IERC20[] memory,contract IAsset[] memory,uint256[] memory)
tuple(contract IERC20[] memory,contract IAsset[] memory,uint256[] memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Core function of the strat, in charge of updating, collecting and re-investing rewards.
 1. It claims rewards from the {merkleOrchard}.
 2. It swaps the {rewardTokens} token for {assets}.
 3. Then deposits the new tokens back to the {Vault}.
@dev Returns total funds staked by the {_address}.
@dev Returns total amount locked in the pool.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) view external returns (contract IERC20[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256)

 {sumOfRewards} - The sum of (rewards)/(totalDeposits) | (S).
 {stakes} - All stakes made by users | (stake).
 {sumOfRewardsForUser} - A sumOfRewards for users at pool join time | (S0).

documentation.text:
@dev Core function of the strat, in charge of updating, collecting and re-investing rewards.
 1. It claims rewards from the {merkleOrchard}.
 2. It swaps the {rewardTokens} token for {assets}.
 3. Then deposits the new tokens back to the {Vault}.
@dev Returns total funds staked by the {_address}.
@dev Returns total amount locked in the pool.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) view external returns (contract IERC20[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256)

documentation.text: @dev Utility function used to create IAsset array.

deposit(uint256[],address[],uint256,addr.details: Function that makes the deposits. Deposits the {amounts} of {tokens} from this contract's balance to the {Vault}.

distribute((uint256,uint256,address,uint.details: Core function of the strat, in charge of updating, collecting and re-investing rewards. 1. It claims rewards from the {merkleOrchard}. 2. It swaps the {rewardTokens} token for {assets}. 3. Then deposits the new tokens back to the {Vault}.

getTotalDeposits().details: Returns total amount locked in the pool.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

userBalance(address).details: Returns total funds staked by the {_address}.

withdraw(address,uint256,bool,address).details: Withdraws funds and sends them to the {recipient}.

Vault.details: Third Party Contracts: {Vault} - the main Balancer contract used for pool exits/joins and swaps. {merkleOrchard} - The contract that distributes reward tokens.

lpPair.details: Contract Variables: {lpPair} - The pair and the pool. {poolId} - Bytes32 representation of the {lpPair}.  The implementation of “Scalable Reward Distribution on the Ethereum Blockchain” paper by B. Batog, L. Boca and N. Johnson. {totalDeposits} - The sum of all active stake deposits | (T). {sumOfRewards} - The sum of (rewards)/(totalDeposits) | (S). {stakes} - All stakes made by users | (stake). {sumOfRewardsForUser} - A sumOfRewards for users at pool join time | (S0).
